## :star2: Description
All content needed to complete application will be finalized by the end of this ticket.

## :star2: User Story
As a [role], I want to [what] so that I can [do something].

## :star2: Related Documentation
- Link documents here; remember to update if they change.

## :star2: Tasks
- [ ] Move issue to In Progress when beginning work
- [ ] For small amounts of content, draft initial content in a mockup or content document
- [ ] Comment and tag team reviewer(s) in Slack once work is ready to be reviewed, include links to work
- [ ] Move issue to Closed once tested/reviewed and accepted by PO
- [ ] Create a Sitewide Content request using the appropriate request template and add reference number to this issue
- [ ] Schedule time with Sitewide Content or attend their open office hours as needed
- [ ] Work with PM and PO on reviewing edited content with key VA stakeholders
- [ ] Log all content-related decisions in a decision log on GitHub
- [ ] Once content is finalized and approved, store the final draft in the product's content directory
- [ ] Create task for Front End engineer to update finalized copy, including links to the final draft and any relevant mockups
- [ ] Move issue to Closed once all tasks and acceptance criteria are are complete

## :star2: Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Initial content draft has been written (if applicable)
- [ ] Sitewide Content request has been created
- [ ] Content from Sitewide team has been reviewed with VA Stakeholders and approved
- [ ] Content-related decisions have been logged
- [ ] Final draft of content has been stored in the product's content directory
- [ ] Ticket has been created for Front End to update application with final copy
